How to Survive in Jungle

Know Your enemy

If you know the enemy and know yourself, you need not fear the result of a hundred battles.

Poisonous Plant

  • Plant life can be a valuable source of food energy and nutrition in any survival scenario.
  • But If you choose the wrong one, you're dead

Animals

  • In the jungle, you can take your pick from thousands of creatures that could harm or kill you.
  • If you're into mammals, everything from wild boars to jaguars and cougars can pose a threat.
  • If insects are your thing, you've got scorpions, brown recluse spiders and fire ants to consider

Water-related illness

  • Jungles are wet places, and sometimes being wet can be dangerous.
  • Trench Foot/Immersion Foot are some of them. Make sure to keep your feet dry

Mosquito-related illness

  • Mosquitoes in the jungle can infect you with malaria, West Nile virus, Dengue fever or yellow fever.
  • Malaria is the worst of the bunch, killing more than 1 million people per year.

What Should we do in order to Survive
